hackathon-description-text: You can help small businesses succeed by helping them
hackathon-requirements: A submission by a Contestant must satisfy the following requirements. See complete rules for full details:

hackathon-judging-criteria.judging-criterion: Is this app something we can see a significant number of our users using? Does it tangibly help them succeed?
Is the app intuitive to use? Does the app make it easy for novices and pros to benefit from? Is there thoughtful user interaction at play?
Does this app render the benefits it says it does? Does it work well? Does it work as expected?
Is the app compelling and/or indispensable? Is this app something our target users will find useful to their business?
Does this app solve for a problem that exists in the market? Does it do it differently than others?

hackathon-description-header: Help small businesses succeed with Infusionsoft!
